c45

Class C45Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • c45.C45Node

  • public class C45Node
extends java.lang.Object
    Nodes used internally by DecisionTree for the C4.5 decision tree algorithm.
    Author:
    Matthew Tetford

    • Constructor Detail

      • C45Node

        public C45Node(Dataset _dataset,
               C45Node _parent,
               Value _class_remove)
        Creates a node with the given data set. Excludes the given target class from splitting. Used for the root node to exclude the target attribute.
        Parameters:
        _dataset - (Dataset): The data set we wish to store.
        _parent - (C45Node): The parent of this node.
        _class_remove - (String): The attribute we wish to exclude from splitting.

      • C45Node

        public C45Node(Dataset _dataset,
               C45Node _parent,
               Value _class_remove,
               Value _split_value)
        Creates a node with the given data set. Excludes the given target class from splitting. Used for children nodes which have data sets that are subsets of their parents.
        Parameters:
        _dataset - (Dataset): The data set we wish to store.
        _parent - (C45Node): The parent of this node.
        _class_remove - (String): The attribute we wish to exclude from splitting
        _split_value - (String): The attribute value this node's data set was split on.

      • C45Node

        public C45Node(Dataset _subdataset,
               C45Node _parent,
               Value _split_attribute,
               int _split_number,
               boolean _gte)
        Creates a node with the given data set. Splits on the given numerical attribute with integers greater than or equal or less than the integer given. Used for children nodes which have data sets that are subsets of their parents.
        Parameters:
        _subdataset - (Dataset)
        _parent - (C45Node)
        _split_attribute - (Value)
        _split_number - (Integer)
        _gte - (boolean)

      • getMaxValue

        public Value getMaxValue(Value target_attribute)
        Gets the most frequent value from the specified target attribute. If there is a tie, the first looked at is returned.
        Parameters:
        target_attribute - (String): The attribute we wish to evaluate the values of.
        Returns:
        (String): The most frequent value.

      • getAccuracy

        public double getAccuracy(Value target_Attribute,
                          Value value)
        Gets the usefulness measure from the current node given the target value.
        Parameters:
        target_Attribute - (Value): The attribute we wish to measure.
        value - (Value): The value we wish to measure.
        Returns:
        (double): The usefulness measure.

      • getSplitValue

        public Value getSplitValue()
        Simply returns the value this node was split on.
        Returns:
        (String): The split value.

      • getDepth

        public int getDepth()
        Gets the depth of the node. The root is at depth 0.
        Returns:
        (int): The depth of the node.
